message:
Hi Hugo:

If you have a GitHub account you can open an issue on my repos and include the image

[https://github.com/dieghernan/dieghernan.github.io/issues/new](https://github.com/dieghernan/dieghernan.github.io/issues/new)

Also it would be useful if you can provide the full code.

Another option is to upload your image to < [https://imgur.io/>](https://imgur.io/%3E) and reply to this comment with the link and the code
message_html:
Hi Hugo:

If you have a GitHub account you can open an issue on my repos and include the image

https://github.com/dieghernan/dieghernan.github.io/issues/new

Also it would be useful if you can provide the full code.

Another option is to upload your image to < https://imgur.io/> and reply to this comment with the link and the code
